CrimeWorld
	https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/taruntiwarihp/crime-world
	https://www.kaggle.com/code/jwbrione/crime-world

Serial Killers Dataset
	https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/vesuvius13/serial-killers-dataset
	https://www.kaggle.com/code/mohandamr/serial-killers
	https://www.kaggle.com/code/renadn/serial-killers-data-visualization
	https://www.kaggle.com/code/ankur296/know-your-serial-killers-well
	https://www.kaggle.com/code/lenawerner/serial-killer-data

Education Statistics
	https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/theworldbank/education-statistics
	https://www.kaggle.com/code/mrisdal/starter-education-statistics-d1de03b0-9

Poverty World
	https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/danofer/wb-poverty
	https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/theworldbank/poverty-and-equity-database
	https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/mathurinache/extreme-poverty

Global Terrorism
	https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/itssuru/global-terrorism

UNICEF State of World Children 2021
    https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/nguyenngocphung/unicef-state-of-world-children-2021?select=Table-1-Demographics-SOWC2021-EN.xlsx
    
Mental Health and Suicide Rates
    https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/twinkle0705/mental-health-and-suicide-rates
    
Global suicide data
    https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/sathutr/global-suicide-data
